page.title: 10Religion contd.
page.content: Church is the Vicarage he receives no stipend.Church services are held weekly_Morning Service with Communion 10.30a.m. each Sunday,except the first Sunday in the month which is a Family Service.Extra services are held at the Religious Festivals and Baptisms, Weddings and Funerals are held as arranged.The Church Graveyard, which surrounds the Church,is maintained by the local "mens group" the "Quest Club". Within the Church Yard is a War Memorial to both World Wars.It commemorates eight members of the parish who perished in the 1914_18 War and seven members who died in the 1939_45 War.The church yard is entered by a Lych gate_this was ercted in memory of Lucy Walton Wilson of this parish who did after a riding accident in 1901.Th oak useed to make the gate
